mapper.select: SELECT a.no, b.name as program_name, a.reg_date, a.whitening_score, a.wrinkle_score, a.elastic_score, a.moisture_score, a.acne_score, a.average_score FROM VISIT a, PROGRAM b WHERE a.user_no = #{userNo } AND a.program_no = b.no ORDER BY a.no
select v.user_no as userNo ,v.reg_date as regDate, fv.path as path ,fv.sava_name as saveName from visit v, f_visit fv where fv.NO = v.IMAGE_NO and v.user_no = #{ userNo } order by regDate asc
